title: Online Science Education Design and Pre-Service Teacher Motivation Enhancement Program [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic educational theories and science curriculum content
context.additional_context: Development of competency in designing online science classes based on the Community of Inquiry framework in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Participants can apply the three core elements of the Community of Inquiry framework (teaching presence, social presence, cognitive presence) to online science classes
Participants can maintain and strengthen motivation for online course design based on self-efficacy and perceived usefulness
Participants can develop formative assessment-centered online science lesson designs executable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
